questions.text: When 600. grams of iron at 300. degrees Celsius is added to 4.00 kilograms of water at 20.0 degrees Celsius, what will be the final temperature of the mixture?

You add 500. grams of an unknown metal at 500. degrees Celsius to 1.00 kilograms of water at 10.0 degrees Celsius. The resultant mixture has a final temperature of 48.32 degrees Celsius. What is most likely the material in question?
